definition: to expand one's financial resources/abbr. for 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
lit. to open a water source and reduce outflow (idiom); to increase income and save on spending/to broaden the sources of income and economize on expenditure

sentences.english: The iPATH Telemedicine Platform is an open-source software.
sentences.chinese: iPATH远程医疗平台是一种开源软件。

sentences.english: Open Source "Social App Server" Might Crack Garden Walls?
sentences.chinese: 开源“社交应用服务器”有可能推倒那些“院墙”？

sentences.english: Both of these website platforms are open source projects that are completely free to use.
sentences.chinese: 这两个网站平台都是开源项目，完全免费使用。

sentences.english: NS2 ( Network Simulator Version2) as open source software, it lacks the ability to simulate some latest developed algorithms.
sentences.chinese: NS2作为开源软件缺少对最新研究算法的模拟能力。

sentences.english: But there doesn’t seem to be any signs of open source-related panic here at WPC10.
sentences.chinese: 不过WPC10这里没见多少与开源相联系的不安。

sentences.english: What this sort of near-propaganda obscures, though, is the real benefits of open source software.
sentences.chinese: 这类近似布道的论调遮盖了开源软件的真正好处。

sentences.english: FileZilla: Open source FTP client and server.
sentences.chinese: 开源的FTP客户端及服务器软件。

sentences.english: He's a writer, presenter and active member of the open source community.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个作家和演讲家，是开源社区的活跃分子。

sentences.english: Julien: Our open source competition is rather low.
sentences.chinese: 我们的开源竞争者非常少。

sentences.english: But today, open source is the means.
sentences.chinese: 但是今天，开源模式是一种手段。

sentences.english: JFA: With open source, it is always a challenge to find who is using your stuff.
sentences.chinese: 因为开源，所以很难说出谁在使用你的东西。

sentences.english: Proprietary drivers are drivers for your hardware which are not freely available or open-source.
sentences.chinese: 专有驱动是不可自由获得或非开源的硬件驱动。

sentences.english: It is a "world wide celebration of Free and Open Source Software and the community behind it."
sentences.chinese: 这是“自由与开源软件以及背后社区的全球庆祝会。”

sentences.english: In part that is because open-source software tends to polarise opinion.
sentences.chinese: 这部分是因为开源软件会使人们的观点分为两个极端。

sentences.english: Open source seems at first as though it violates the expectations of a functioning marketplace.
sentences.chinese: 开源在一开始好像违背了市场运作的预期方式。

sentences.english: Do you plan to sell it or opensource it as a standalone application?
sentences.chinese: 你们有把它作为一个独立应用卖出去或开源的计划吗？

definition: see 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
free software (i.e. software for which sharing, modification etc is permitted)
to control flow/to choke/weir valve/a throttle/a choke
